description: Defines an interface IEventHandler with callback methods for container state events such as started, stopped, failed, and state change, within the WPEFramework Plugin namespace.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: Interface for handling container lifecycle events with methods for start, stop, failure, and state change notifications.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container is started, receives JSON data about the container.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container is stopped, receives JSON data about the container.

methods.name: onContainerFailed
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container fails, receives JSON data about the failure.

methods.name: onContainerStateChange
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container's state changes, receives JSON data reflecting new state.
